bibl.title: Herodotus' Description of the East Mediterranean Coast. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Herodotus' description is seen to reflect socio-ethnic and political arrangements in effect since the Late Bronze Age which continued through the Iron Age and into the Hellenistic period.
RAINEY Anson F., Herodotus' Description of the East Mediterranean Coast. Avec résumé en anglais.
